column1: Smoque BBQ////Luckily I had zero wait time
column2: no line and no crowd at all - trust me
column3: it is worth none of all of that (Zagat and Guy Fieri can be damned if those bitches disagree). But if you're in the area and it's about 3-5pm with no line or anything
column4: feel free to have yourself a decent and probably forgettable meal (as long as you don't make the critical mistake of hyping it up in your own head too much...). And the people who work here are super sweet
column5: which always makes even mediocre food go down easier. I'll probably visit again
column6: too - I'm not always lucky enough to be near better bbq.
